tr.td:
Procedure target body site. Details of where the procedure was performed.
Binding Description: (example): 1.3.6.1.4.1.12559.11.10.1.3.1.42.65 eHDSIBodySite (SCT, used in MH@EU); http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-ver-status (required in HL7 FHIR)

tr.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px; vertical-align: top; background-color: white

td.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; white-space: nowrap; background-image: url(tbl_bck10.png)

a.title: This element shall be present when used to describe a procedure event. It shall have the value 'completed' for procedures that have been completed and 'active' for procedures that are still in progress. Procedures that were stopped prior to completion shall use the value 'aborted', and procedures that were cancelled before being started shall use the value 'cancelled'.

td.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px

vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px

tr.td:
Status of the procedure
Binding Description: (example): 2.16.840.1.113883.3.1937.777.11.11.3 ActStatusActiveAbortedCancelledCompleted

tr.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px; vertical-align: top; background-color: #F7F7F7

a.title: It indicates the priority of the procedure.

tr.td:
It indicates the priority of the procedure.
Binding Description: (example): 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 ActPriority

description.value: C.16 - EHDS refined base model for An action that is or was performed on or for a patient

definition.value: C.16 - EHDS refined base model for An action that is or was performed on or for a patient

short.value: Common header for all patient-related data

definition.value: Common header for all patient-related data
Patient/subject information
Business identifier for the object
Resource authoring details
Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.
Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

short.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource

definition.value: Date and time of the last update to the document/information
Status of the resource

short.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.

definition.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
Business version of the resource.

short.value: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

definition.value: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

definition.value: This element shall be present when used to describe a procedure event. It shall have the value 'completed' for procedures that have been completed and 'active' for procedures that are still in progress. Procedures that were stopped prior to completion shall use the value 'aborted', and procedures that were cancelled before being started shall use the value 'cancelled'.

short.value: It indicates the priority of the procedure.

definition.value: It indicates the priority of the procedure.
